MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA15 postcode area of Beith. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:35pm to make a safe repair to an underground cable fault on Sycamore Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:34pm on 16th March 2021.
